committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Reclamation Projects Act of 1956, as amended, to require the Secretary of the Interior to charge interest on loans used to furnish water to irrigate surplus crops.

summary.text: Amends the Small Reclamation Projects Act of 1956 to require the Secretary of the Interior to charge interest on loans used to furnish water to irrigate crops for which there is in effect for that year a program to limit production of such crops.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Reclamation Projects Act of 1956, as amended, to require the Secretary of the Interior to charge interest on loans used to furnish water to irrigate surplus crops.
